General.Name: BEH Property Co Ltd
General.Description: BEH-Property Co.,Ltd. together with subsidiaries engages in the real estate development and management business in China. The company develops, sells, and leases commercial housing properties, as well as constructs shantytown renovation, affordable housing, and price-limited housing. In addition, it engages in interior decoration; daily necessities; needles and textiles; clothing; shoes and hats; gold and silver jewelry; mechanical and electrical products; ethnic commodities; automobile trade; accommodation; catering; entertainment services; and import and export businesses. BEH-Property Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Jin  Yu
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Gen. Counselor
